ground_truth: GANDALF looks at the approaching ORC ARMY, now less than 50 yards from the WALLS of the CITY. MIGHTY WOODEN CATAPULTS positioned within the walls of MINAS TIRITH are fired. THWAT! THWAT! THWAT! CATAPULTS send their great ROCKS high into the air, over the BATTLEMENTS! Dizzying AERIAL SHOTS of huge BOULDERS flying up close to CAMERA then falling away towards the ORCS! CRUNCH!! BOULDERS flatten ORCS. THWAT!! 100 more ROCKS. THWAT!! another 100!! The ORC FRONT RANKS are in disarray. As the GREAT BOULDERS land among them the ORC start to PANIC. GANDALF walks the BATTLEMENTS as the huge BOULDERS rain onto the ORC ARMY below. GOTHMOG glances up at a WHISTLING SOUND -- a huge BOULDER hurtles towards him. He side-steps CALMLY out of the way spitting on the BOULDER in CONTEMPT. SUDDENLY! 9 NAZGUL DIVE out of the DIM SKY, CLAD in BATTLE. SOLDIERS throw themselves down as the NAZGUL zoom overhead, emitting their PIERCING SHRIEKS! GONDORIAN SOLDIERS run for SHELTER in PANIC, covering their ears. MIGHTY WOODEN CATAPULTS positioned within the walls of MINAS TIRITH are fired! The NAZGUL circle LOW over the CITY, like VULTURES seeking doomed men's flesh. SOLDIERS are plucked into the AIR by SHRIEKING NAZGUL and dropped to their DEATHS hundreds of FEET BELOW. TOWERS and BUILDINGS are DESTROYED. CHAOS as SOLDIERS, WOMEN, and CHILDREN DODGE falling MASONRY. GONDORIAN SOLDIERS send a rain of arrows at the approaching TOWERS and TROLLS. TOO LATE! The TOWERS reach the walls, their DOORS crashing down, releasing ORCS directly onto the LOWER LEVELS. As the ORC swarm from the TOWER, GANDALF realises PIPPIN has come down from the CITADEL. PIPPIN looks on stunned, as a HUGE ORC leaps towards him. GANDALF intercepts the BEAST, striking him with his STAFF. GANDALF welds his STAFF, cutting through the attacking ORC with EASE. BEHIND him, an ORC prepares to cut down GANDALF. PIPPIN instinctively slashes his SWORD at him. GANDALF turns on PIPPIN, smiling despite himself. Out of BLACK SWIRLING BATTLE. SMOKE crawls an IRON MONSTER! A MASSIVE WHEELED BATTERING RAM. 60 FEET HIGH and 150 FEET LONG. pushed by 20 huge MOUNTAIN TROLLS. a MASSIVE IRON HEAD, cast in the likeness of a SNARLING WOLF. this is GROND. the BATTERING RAM FROM HELL! The Orc are chanting as the BEAST is wheeled closer and closer to the. GANDALF blanching at the sight of this crawling. GOLLUM leads FRODO up a LONG RAVINE between COLUMNS of TORN and WEATHERED ROCK. AHEAD is a GREAT GREY WALL, a last huge mass of mountainstone, and in the SHADOWS at the base of the TOWERING ROCK lies a TUNNEL. FRODO reacts to the FOUL STENCH coming out of the BLACK HOLE. SMEAGOL sensing his PLAN unravelling.

The Orc are intoning as the FIEND is driven nearer and nearer to the. GANDALF blanching at the sight of this creeping. AHEAD is a GREAT GREY BARRIER, a final gigantic mass of mountainstone, and in the SHADOWS at the base of the TOWERING STONE lies a PASSAGE. FRODO reacts to the NOXIOUS STENCH coming out of the BLACK CAVITY. SMEAGOL sensing his SCHEME unraveling.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
GANDALF stands resolute, his gaze fixed on the massive ORC ARMY advancing steadily, now less than a mere 50 yards from the formidable WALLS of the ancient CITY. Positioned strategically within these walls of the grand MINAS TIRITH are MIGHTY WOODEN CATAPULTS, ready for action. Suddenly, with a resounding THWAT! THWAT! THWAT!, the CATAPULTS unleash their mighty payloads, hurling colossal ROCKS high into the sky, soaring over the steadfast BATTLEMENTS. The scene is captured in dizzying AERIAL SHOTS as enormous BOULDERS ascend perilously close to the CAMERA before plummeting with great force towards the ORCS below. CRUNCH!! The BOULDERS strike decisively, flattening ORCS beneath their immense weight. THWAT!! Another 100 ROCKS launch into the air. THWAT!! And yet another 100 follow! The leading ranks of the ORC army fall into disarray, chaos reigning as the GREAT BOULDERS crash among them, causing burgeoning panic. Meanwhile, GANDALF strolls calmly along the BATTLEMENTS, unfazed as the devastating BOULDERS rain down upon the ORC ARMY below.

GOTHMOG casts his gaze upwards, alerted by a WHISTLING SOUND -- a massive BOULDER is hurtling toward him with alarming speed. Displaying remarkable composure, he sidesteps the projectile CALMLY, even spitting disdainfully on the BOULDER in utter CONTEMPT. SUDDENLY! From the DIM SKY above, 9 formidable NAZGUL dive BOLDLY into the fray, CLAD in full BATTLE regalia. SOLDIERS throw themselves to the ground as the NAZGUL swoop overhead, their PIERCING SHRIEKS filling the air! GONDORIAN SOLDIERS scatter in PANIC, desperately seeking SHELTER while covering their ears to block out the chilling cries. Once again, the MIGHTY WOODEN CATAPULTS within the walls of MINAS TIRITH fire their loads with precision! The NAZGUL circle LOW over the besieged CITY like ominous VULTURES, seeking the flesh of men doomed to fall. SOLDIERS are snatched from the earth by SHRIEKING NAZGUL, only to be released and meet their DEATHS hundreds of FEET BELOW. TOWERS and BUILDINGS crumble, leaving CHAOS in their wake as SOLDIERS, WOMEN, and CHILDREN desperately DODGE the falling MASONRY.

GONDORIAN SOLDIERS launch a torrent of arrows at the advancing TOWERS and TROLLS. But it is TOO LATE! The TOWERS reach the WALLS with a thunderous roar, their formidable DOORS crashing open to unleash ORCS directly onto the LOWER LEVELS of the city. As the ORCS swarm from the TOWER, GANDALF suddenly notices PIPPIN has descended from the safety of the CITADEL. PIPPIN stands in shock, watching as a HUGE ORC charges towards him. GANDALF steps in, intercepting the BEAST and striking it with his STAFF. With remarkable EASE, GANDALF wields his STAFF, cutting through the attacking ORC as if it were nothing. BEHIND him, an ORC readies to strike GANDALF down, but PIPPIN instinctively swings his SWORD, defending him. GANDALF turns to PIPPIN, a smile tugging at his lips despite the dire circumstances.

Out of the swirling, BLACK BATTLE SMOKE emerges a menacing sight: an IRON MONSTER! This MASSIVE WHEELED BATTERING RAM stands an imposing 60 FEET HIGH and stretches 150 FEET LONG, pushed forward by 20 enormous MOUNTAIN TROLLS. Its front, dominated by a GIANT IRON HEAD cast in the likeness of a SNARLING WOLF, is GRONDâ€”the BATTERING RAM FROM HELL itself! The ORC chant ominously as the BEAST inches ever closer, its presence sending a shiver down GANDALFâ€™s spine. Nearby, GOLLUM leads FRODO through a LONG RAVINE flanked by COLUMNS of TORN and WEATHERED ROCK. Ahead of them rises a GREAT GREY WALL, a last massive formation of mountainstone, and in the foreboding SHADOWS at the base of the TOWERING ROCK lies a sinister TUNNEL. FRODO reacts instinctively to the FOUL STENCH emanating from this foreboding BLACK HOLE, while SMEAGOL becomes increasingly anxious, sensing his nefarious PLAN unraveling before him.

FRODO reacts instinctively to the FOUL STENCH emanating from this dark and foreboding BLACK HOLE, while SMEAGOL becomes increasingly anxious, sensing his nefarious and treacherous PLAN unraveling before him.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As Gandalf fixes his gaze on the approaching Orc army, now less than 50 yards from the city walls, he evaluates the imminent threat. Within the walls of Minas Tirith, mighty wooden catapults, meticulously prepared for such an assault, are launched with precision. The sound of their release echoes as "Thwat! Thwat! Thwat!" with these colossal machines sending their enormous rocks soaring high into the sky, clearing the battlements. The cinematic aerial perspective captures the dizzying trajectory of these huge boulders as they arc through the air, coming perilously close to the camera before gravity takes over and they plummet violently towards the Orcs below. With a resounding "Crunch!," the boulders make contact, flattening row upon row of the Orc soldiers. Again, the catapults discharge another volleyâ€”"Thwat!" one hundred more rocks are released, followed immediately by "Thwat!" another hundred. The impact creates chaos among the Orc front ranks, causing widespread panic as the great boulders continue to land, wreaking havoc amongst them. Amidst the devastation, Gandalf strides purposefully along the battlements, observing as the massive stones continue to rain down on the besieging Orc army. In the midst of this chaos, Gothmog, showing no fear, glances upward at the ominous whistling sound of a boulder speeding toward him. With practiced calm and disdain, he sidesteps its deadly path and spits contemptuously at the passing rock. Suddenly, the atmosphere shifts as nine NazgÃ»l dive out of the dim sky, clad in their fearsome battle attire. With their piercing shrieks filling the air, the soldiers below react instinctively, throwing themselves down to avoid the menacing overhead flight. Panic overtakes the Gondorian soldiers as they frantically seek shelter, covering their ears to escape the chilling cries of the NazgÃ»l. Meanwhile, the wooden catapults within Minas Tirith's walls are once again fired, continuing their relentless assault. The NazgÃ»l, like vultures hunting doomed flesh, circle low over the city, plucking soldiers into the air and callously dropping them to their deaths hundreds of feet below. Towers and buildings crumble under the assault, causing chaos as soldiers, women, and children frantically dodge the falling masonry. Despite the turmoil, Gondorian soldiers valiantly launch a rain of arrows at the advancing towers and trolls, but it proves futile as the towers, with grim inevitability, reach the walls. Their doors crash down, unleashing hordes of Orcs directly onto the lower levels of the city. As the Orcs swarm from the tower, Gandalf realizes with alarm that Pippin has descended from the citadel. In a moment of shock, Pippin stands transfixed as a huge Orc leaps toward him. With swift precision, Gandalf intercepts the beast, striking it decisively with his staff, effortlessly cutting through the attacking foe. Behind Gandalf, another Orc readies itself to attack, but Pippin, acting on instinct, slashes with his sword, saving Gandalf. In response, Gandalf turns to Pippin, offering a smile even amidst the chaos. Out of the black, swirling battle smoke emerges an iron monstrosityâ€”a massive wheeled battering ram, 60 feet high and 150 feet long, pushed by twenty formidable mountain trolls. This beast, with a massive iron head cast in the likeness of a snarling wolf, is Grond, the battering ram from hell. The orcs chant reverently as Grond inches closer and closer, causing Gandalf to blanch at the sight of this terror. Meanwhile, Gollum leads Frodo up a long ravine between columns of torn and weathered rock. Ahead looms a great grey wall, a massive expanse of mountain stone, and in the shadows at the base of this towering rock lies a tunnel. Frodo reacts with revulsion to the foul stench emanating from the black hole, while Smeagol nervously senses his plan beginning to unravel.

test_cases.description:
Gandalf observes the approaching Orc army from the walls of Minas Tirith, as mighty wooden catapults launch boulders over the battlements. These projectiles crash into the Orc ranks, causing chaos and panic. Walking along the battlements, Gandalf remains focused amid the turmoil. The Orc leader, Gothmog, narrowly avoids a boulder, sidestepping it with disdain.

Suddenly, nine NazgÃ»l dive from the sky, causing soldiers to scatter in terror as their piercing shrieks fill the air. Gondorian soldiers, panicked, flee for shelter, while catapults continue firing to repel the assault. The NazgÃ»l swoop low, plucking soldiers into the air, causing significant destruction to towers and buildings. Amidst this chaos, Gondorian archers launch a futile arrow assault against the towering siege towers now reaching the city walls, releasing a swarm of Orcs onto the lower levels.

Gandalf notices Pippin has descended from the Citadel, stunned by the frenzy. As a huge Orc leaps towards Pippin, Gandalf intercepts with his staff, swiftly dispatching the attacker. When another Orc threatens Gandalf from behind, Pippin instinctively intervenes, slashing it with his sword. Gandalf, turning to Pippin, offers a smile despite the dire situation. Meanwhile, an immense iron battering ram, Grond, emerges from the smoky battlefield, pushed by mountain trolls and ominously moving towards the city.

Amidst this scene, Gollum guides Frodo through a ravine lined with weathered rock, leading them towards a foul-smelling tunnel at the base of a massive grey wall. Sensing his plan unraveling, SmÃ©agol grows increasingly anxious.

The TOWERS reach the walls, their DOORS crashing down, releasing ORCS directly onto the LOWER LEVELS. As the ORC swarm from the TOWER, GANDALF realizes PIPPIN, one of the brave hobbits from the Shire, has come down from the CITADEL, the central stronghold of the city. PIPPIN looks on stunned, as a HUGE ORC, a creature bred for war, leaps towards him. GANDALF intercepts the BEAST, striking him with his STAFF, a symbol of his authority and power. GANDALF wields his STAFF, cutting through the attacking ORC with EASE. BEHIND him, an ORC prepares to cut down GANDALF. PIPPIN, gathering courage from his adventures, instinctively slashes his SWORD at him. GANDALF turns on PIPPIN, smiling despite himself at the young hobbit's bravery. Out of BLACK SWIRLING BATTLE SMOKE crawls an IRON MONSTER! A MASSIVE WHEELED BATTERING RAM, 60 FEET HIGH and 150 FEET LONG, pushed by 20 huge MOUNTAIN TROLLS, creatures known for their immense strength. It has a MASSIVE IRON HEAD, cast in the likeness of a SNARLING WOLF. Known as GROND, the BATTERING RAM FROM HELL, it is named after the weapon of the Dark Lord Morgoth. The Orc are chanting in a primal rhythm as the BEAST is wheeled closer and closer to the gate. GANDALF, blanching at the sight of this crawling machine of destruction, prepares to resist. Meanwhile, GOLLUM, once a hobbit-like creature twisted by the power of the One Ring, leads FRODO up a LONG RAVINE between COLUMNS of TORN and WEATHERED ROCK. AHEAD is a GREAT GREY WALL, a last huge mass of mountainstone, and in the SHADOWS at the base of the TOWERING ROCK lies a TUNNEL, a foreboding entrance into darkness. FRODO reacts to the FOUL STENCH coming out of the BLACK HOLE, reminiscent of decay and hidden dangers. SMEAGOL, the split personality of GOLLUM, sensing his PLAN to betray them unravelling.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: GANDALF looks at the approaching DRAGON FLOCK, now less than 50 yards from the GATES of the VILLAGE. MIGHTY WOODEN BALLISTAE positioned within the gates of RIVENDELL are fired. FWOOSH! FWOOSH! FWOOSH! BALLISTAE send their great SPEARS high into the air, over the PARAPETS! Dizzying AERIAL SHOTS of huge ARROWS flying up close to CAMERA then falling away towards the DRAGONS! SPLAT!! ARROWS pierce DRAGONS. FWOOSH!! 100 more SPEARS. FWOOSH!! another 100!! The DRAGON LEADERSHIP is in disarray. As the GREAT ARROWS land among them, the DRAGONS start to FALTER. GANDALF walks the PARAPETS as the huge ARROWS rain onto the DRAGON FLOCK below. GOTHMOG glances up at a WHISTLING SOUND -- a huge ARROW hurtles towards him. He side-steps CALMLY out of the way, spitting on the ARROW in DISDAIN. SUDDENLY! 9 ROGUES DIVE out of the DIM SKY, CLAD in ARMOR. CITIZENS throw themselves down as the ROGUES zoom overhead, emitting their PIERCING WAILS! ELVEN GUARDS run for COVER in PANIC, covering their ears. MIGHTY WOODEN BALLISTAE positioned within the gates of RIVENDELL are fired! The ROGUES circle LOW over the VILLAGE, like HAWKS seeking doomed men's flesh. GUARDS are plucked into the AIR by WAILING ROGUES and dropped to their DOOMS hundreds of METERS BELOW. TOWERS and HOMES are DESTROYED. CHAOS as GUARDS, WOMEN, and CHILDREN DODGE falling DEBRIS. ELVEN GUARDS send a rain of arrows at the approaching TOWERS and OGRES. TOO LATE! The TOWERS reach the gates, their DOORS crashing down, releasing DRAGONS directly onto the UPPER LEVELS. As the DRAGONS swarm from the TOWER, GANDALF realises SAM has come down from the FORTRESS. SAM looks on stunned, as a HUGE DRAGON leaps towards him. GANDALF intercepts the CREATURE, striking him with his LANCE. GANDALF wields his LANCE, cutting through the attacking DRAGON with EASE. GOTHMOG admires up at a WHISTLING SOUND -- a huge BOULDER drifts towards him. He leaps playfully out of the way giggling at the BOULDER in AMUSEMENT. SUDDENLY! 9 NAZGUL RISE out of the DIM SKY, CLAD in BATTLE. SOLDIERS clap their hands as the NAZGUL drift overhead, blasting their PIERCING SHRIEKS! GONDORIAN SOLDIERS slide for SHELTER in EXCITEMENT, covering their ears. MIGHTY WOODEN CATAPULTS positioned within the walls of MINAS TIRITH are dismantled! The NAZGUL hover HIGH over the CITY, like VULTURES observing doomed men's flesh. SOLDIERS are lifted onto the AIR by SHRIEKING NAZGUL and set to their DEATHS hundreds of FEET BELOW. TOWERS and BUILDINGS are RESTORED. CALMNESS as SOLDIERS, WOMEN, and CHILDREN BRUSH falling MASONRY. GONDORIAN SOLDIERS release a drizzle of arrows at the arriving TOWERS and TROLLS. TOO SLOW! The TOWERS reach the walls, their DOORS gently opening, guiding ORCS directly onto the LOWER LEVELS. As the ORC scatter from the TOWER, GANDALF notices PIPPIN has come down from the CITADEL. PIPPIN looks on amused, as a HUGE ORC strolls towards him. GANDALF embraces the BEAST, nudging him with his STAFF. GANDALF drags his STAFF, dancing through the approaching ORC with EASE. BEHIND him, an ORC prepares to greet GANDALF. PIPPIN instinctively taps his SWORD at him. GANDALF gazes at PIPPIN, chuckling despite himself. Out of BLACK SWIRLING BATTLE, SMOKE collects an IRON MONSTER! A MASSIVE WHEELED BATTERING RAM. 60 FEET HIGH and 150 FEET LONG, admired by 20 huge MOUNTAIN TROLLS. a MASSIVE IRON HEAD, cast in the likeness of a SMILING WOLF. this is GROND, the BATTERING RAM FROM HELL! The Orc are cheering as the BEAST is celebrated closer and closer to the. GANDALF grinning at the sight of this soaring. GOLLUM follows FRODO up a LONG RAVINE between COLUMNS of TORN and WEATHERED ROCK. AHEAD is a GREAT GREY WALL, a last huge mass of mountainstone, and in the SHADOWS at the base of the TOWERING ROCK lies a TUNNEL. FRODO admires the SWEET SCENT coming out of the BLACK HOLE. SMEAGOL sensing his PLAN unraveling.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: SPACESHIP looks at the approaching ZOMBIE HORDE, now less than 50 yards from the FENCES of the VILLAGE. ENORMOUS METAL CANNONS positioned within the fences of ATLANTIS are launched. WHOOSH! WHOOSH! WHOOSH! CANNONS send their massive STATUES high into the sky, over the RAMPARTS! Dazzling SKY SHOTS of giant PILLARS flying up close to LENS then descending toward the ZOMBIES! CRASH!! PILLARS squash ZOMBIES. WHOOSH!! 100 more STATUES. WHOOSH!! another 100!! The ZOMBIE FRONT LINES are in chaos. As the GIANT PILLARS land among them the ZOMBIE begin to FLEE. SPACESHIP strolls the RAMPARTS as the enormous PILLARS pour onto the ZOMBIE HORDE below. DRAGON notices a HISSING NOISE -- a gigantic PILLAR speeds towards it. It steps aside EFFORTLESSLY out of the way sneering at the PILLAR in SCORN. SUDDENLY! 9 PHANTOMS PLUNGE out of the DUSK SKY, DRESSED in ARMOR. VILLAGERS hurl themselves down as the PHANTOMS zip overhead, releasing their DEAFENING WAILS! ELVEN VILLAGERS dash for REFUGE in TERROR, covering their heads. ENORMOUS METAL CANNONS positioned within the fences of ATLANTIS are launched! The PHANTOMS swoop LOW over the VILLAGE, like HAWKS hunting doomed men's bones. VILLAGERS are grabbed into the SKY by SCREECHING PHANTOMS and dropped to their DOOMS hundreds of METERS BELOW. TOWERS and HUTS are RUINED. PANDEMONIUM as VILLAGERS, MEN, and BABIES EVADE tumbling STONEWORK. ELVEN VILLAGERS send a storm of spears at the advancing CASTLES and GIANTS. TOO LATE! The CASTLES reach the fences, their GATES crashing down, releasing ZOMBIES directly onto the LOWER TIERS. As the ZOMBIE emerge from the CASTLE, SPACESHIP realises SAM has come down from the STRONGHOLD. SAM gapes, as a MASSIVE ZOMBIE lunges towards him. SPACESHIP obstructs the CREATURE, hitting it with its WAND. SPACESHIP brandishes its WAND, slicing through the charging ZOMBIE with GRACE. BEHIND it, a ZOMBIE gets ready to slash SPACESHIP. SAM reflexively swings his DAGGER at it. SPACESHIP pivots towards SAM, grinning despite itself. Out of DARK SWIRLING FIGHT. FOG creeps an STEEL MACHINE! A HUGE ROLLED CATAPULT. 60 METERS HIGH and 150 METERS LONG. pushed by 20 giant HILL GIANTS. a GIGANTIC STEEL FACE, cast in the resemblance of a ROARING DRAGON. this is GROUT. the CATAPULT FROM CHAOS! The Zombie chant as the CREATURE is pushed nearer and nearer to the. SPACESHIP paling at the view of this creeping. TROLL leads BILBO up a LONG GORGE between ROWS of TORN and WORN BOULDERS. AHEAD is a GRAND WHITE FENCE, a final enormous body of cliffstone, and in the SHADE at the foot of the LOOMING CLIFF lies a PASSAGE. BILBO reacts to the DISGUSTING STINK coming out of the DARK OPENING. BLOB sensing its SCHEME falling apart.

WATCHTOWERS and STRUCTURES are OBLITERATED. PANDEMONIUM as GUARDS, MEN, and YOUTH EVADE tumbling ROCKS. ELF WARRIORS unleash a barrage of spears at the nearing WATCHTOWERS and OGRES. TOO LATE! The WATCHTOWERS hit the gates, their ENTRANCES smashing open, discharging GOBLINS straight onto the LOWER GROUNDS. As the GOBLIN flood from the WATCHTOWER, FRODO notices SAM has descended from the FORTRESS. SAM watches in disbelief, as a GIANT GOBLIN lunges at him. FRODO diverts the CREATURE, hitting him with his BLADE. FRODO maneuvers his BLADE, slicing through the charging GOBLIN with GRACE. BEHIND him, a GOBLIN gets ready to strike down FRODO. SAM instinctively lunges his DAGGER at him. FRODO turns to SAM, grinning despite it all. Out of BLACK CHURNING CONFLICT. ASH rolls an IRON GIANT! A GARGANTUAN WHEELED SIEGE ENGINE. 60 FEET TALL and 150 FEET LONG. shoved by 20 enormous CAVE OGRES. a GIGANTIC METAL HEAD, molded in the visage of a SNARLING WYVERN. this is JORMUNGANDR. the SIEGE ENGINE FROM NIGHTMARES! The GOBLIN are cheering as the MONSTER is dragged nearer and nearer to the. FRODO shivering at the sight of this rolling. SARUMAN leads MERRY down a LONG CHASM beside COLUMNS of CRACKED and AGED STONE. AHEAD is a GREAT BLACK CLIFF, a final enormous chunk of mountainstone, and in the GLOOM at the base of the LOOMING CLIFF lies a PASSAGE. MERRY reacts to the RANCID AROMA wafting from the DARK PIT. GOLLUM sensing his SCHEME falling apart.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby cafÃ©, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Gandalf observes the approaching Orc army near Minas Tirith's walls. The city's mighty catapults launch rocks, causing chaos and panic within the Orc ranks. Gothmog sidesteps a boulder, showing contempt. Suddenly, nine Nazgul swoop down, their shrieks causing panic among Gondor soldiers, who run for shelter. The Nazgul wreak havoc, plucking soldiers into the air. Despite the soldiers' arrows, siege towers reach the walls, releasing Orcs onto the lower levels. Gandalf notices Pippin amidst the chaos and saves him from an Orc, with Pippin bravely striking another attacker. An enormous battering ram, Grond, approaches, pushed by mountain trolls. Meanwhile, Gollum guides Frodo through a ravine toward a tunnel, revealing a sinister plan.
